title: Overflow Universal Lead Scraper
description: Input schema for campaign-specific scraping of websites to extract lead intelligence and messaging signals.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of URLs to begin scraping from. These should be relevant to the campaign (e.g. vendor directories, faculty pages, retreat listings).

campaignMode.title: Campaign Mode
campaignMode.description: Which type of campaign this run supports. Determines classification and routing logic.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of concurrent pages crawled. Defaults to 10.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify proxy or custom proxy URLs for distributed IPs.

includeRawText.title: Include Raw Text
includeRawText.description: Whether to store raw page text in the output. Useful for debugging or GPT enrichment.
